alert.note: Alert for Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 04 at 3:31PM AKDT until November 07 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Strong winds and blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches possible. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could damage buildings. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cape lisburne could see winds to 80 mph.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
